summary: Replaces the player's ugly vampire face with his normal/mortal face.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Thank you all for 1k endoresements[/size].


This is a REALLY simple mod, i made in 5 minutes and therefore issues may occure but for me it worked so i thought sharing is caring :)

[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]DISCLAIMER:[/b][/size][/color]

This mod is somewhat old but still works as intended. However I recently made another mod with which you can use ANY facetexture you want. All you need to do, is press a button. I recommend you check it out: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57346/]UHFTfV - Use Human Face Texture for Vampires[/url] (I may have overdone it with the acronym :D)


[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Description:[/b][/size][/color]

In my opinion is the players face ugly, once he is transformed into a vampire. My attempt to fix this via "showracemenu" failed every time i loaded a save. So i replaced the vampire face texture with the vanilla human face texture and the texture from "Better Females by Bella". There are two files. One contains the vanilla male and female human facetexture and the other contains only the female texture from "Better Females by Bella".

[b][color=#ff0000]
[size=4]How it works:[/size][/color][/b]

The Dawnguard files are in a file called Dawnguard.bsa whereas my files are in a folder structure. Skyrim uses the .bsa as resource BUT prefers "raw folders". So my files do not overwrite anything. Actually you can do this yourself but i thought some people dont know how to do this or are too lazy.


[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Recommended Mods:[/size][/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57346/]UHFTfV - Use Human Face Texture for Vampires[/url] (One needs to do some advertise for oneself :D)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42049/]Porcelain Vampire Skin For- CBBE UNP CHSBHC ADEC SeveNBase and Dream Girl[/url] (Makes my mod obsolete, but I use it nowadays and I really recommend it)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38829/]BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes[/url] (Gives all vampires better fangs and eyes, hence the name)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41634/]DVA Dynamic Vampire Appearance[/url] (Your vampire character will have different appearances depending on your vampiric stage and some other things)


[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Issues:[/b][/size][/color]

The Vampires in Volkihar Keep now also have a normal facetexture
[color=#ff0000][size=4]

[b]Changelog:[/b][/size][/color]

1.0 Release
1.1 Added "Better Females by Bella" version , removed ReadMe (full of grammar mistakes etc) from first file

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]
Credits:[/b][/size][/color]

BellaGail for the awesome female facetextures ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella[/url])
author: Alistair77
